landing.title: Find your perfect ski day
landing.description: Real-time snow conditions, crowd predictions, weather forecasts, and a smart scoring algorithm to help you pick the best resort — today.
landing.featuresDescription: Six real-time factors, one smart score. No more guessing — just open the map and go where the snow is best.
landing.featurePerfectDayDesc: Our algorithm weighs 6 real-time factors to give each resort a score from 0 to 100 — so you know exactly where to go.
landing.featureSnowDesc: Base depth, summit depth, and fresh snow in the last 24h. Get Powder Alerts when over 20cm of fresh snow falls.
landing.featureCrowdDesc: Know how crowded each resort will be before you leave. Avoid the queues and find hidden quiet spots.
landing.featureWeatherDesc: Real-time weather data with condition icons: sunny, cloudy, snowing, or storm. Plan with confidence.
landing.featurePriceDesc: Compare adult day pass prices across resorts. Color-coded quality indicators show you the best deals.
landing.featureDistanceDesc: GPS-powered distance calculation and estimated driving times from your current location to each resort.
landing.scoreDescription: Six weighted factors combine into a single 0-100 score, calculated client-side in under 500ms.
landing.resortsDescription: From legendary powder to family-friendly slopes — all the best spots between Lyon, Grenoble, Annecy, and Geneva.
landing.ctaDescription: Open the interactive map, allow your GPS, and instantly see which resort has the best conditions for you — right now.

priorities.title: Your Priorities
priorities.description: Drag to reorder or use arrow buttons. The top factor has the most influence on your Perfect Day Score.
